ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pgpfi.1 | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( P pGrp G /\ X e. Fin ) -> P pGrp G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_pgpgrp | |- ( P pGrp G -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_pgpfi2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( P pGrp G <-> ( P e. Prime /\ ( # ` X ) = ( P ^ ( P pCnt ( # ` X ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( P pGrp G /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( P pGrp G <-> ( P e. Prime /\ ( # ` X ) = ( P ^ ( P pCnt ( # ` X ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( P pGrp G /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( P e. Prime /\ ( # ` X ) = ( P ^ ( P pCnt ( # ` X ) ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( P pGrp G /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( # ` X ) = ( P ^ ( P pCnt ( # ` X ) ) ) ) |
